name: No More Rewinds
description:
Avoid distractions!

You don't want to have to keep rewinding every time someone gets distracted. So, watch out for distractions.

Whenever someone gets distracted, press the letter on the keyboard that corresponds to that distractions until it's avoided.

Use F to avoid distractions from flies.

Use M to avoid distractions from phones.

Use S to avoid distractions from sleep.

Use T to avoid distractions from talking.

At the left corner of the screen, you'll see how many rewinds you have left.

Good luck!
